```{r}
# Define a simple transformation function
add_one <- function(data) {
  data[] <- lapply(data, function(x) if(is.numeric(x)) x + 1 else x)
  return(data)
}

# Use the function on the mtcars dataset
modified_data <- add_one(mtcars)
modified_data
```
